sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './MeetingSearchCard.css' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' const MeetingSearchCard = props => { const date = new Date(Date.parse(props.date)) console.log(date.getDay()) return (

{props.meetingName}

Fecha:

Hora: {date.getHours()}:

Lugares disponibles: {props.freeSeats}

) } export default MeetingSearchCard
